events.name: meadow1
events.intro_message:
You find yourself in a meadow.
You are very thirsty after walking through the desert and need water to live.
events.death_message:
Unfortunately you couldn't find any water.
You pass out. dun dun dun.....
events.look_message: The grass is pretty long! You could go backwards through the desert or south into the unknown.

unobtainable_items.message: It cuts your hand as you try to rip it out of the ground. "OUCH!"

required_to_live.message:
You took a swig of your water bottle.
"Always be Prepared, right?!"

events.name: desert1
events.intro_message: You stumble into a desert.
events.look_message:
Everywhere you look you see sand.
You really should keep heading west, but you could turn back east.

obtainable_items.message: You fill your pockets with sand... what a wierdo.

events.name: mountains1
events.intro_message: As you climb some mountains you realize it's been a couple days since you ate.
events.death_message: "soooo... hungry...."
events.look_message:
From this high up you can see forests, deserts, and a great city of green in the distance!
Looks like any direction but north is available.

events.name: cabin1
events.intro_message: You find a large oak tree in the middle of the meadow.
events.victory_message:
The wildlife here is abundent!
You think you'll start a new life here...
maybe with little squirrels babies and your friends.

events.name: rainforest1
events.intro_message: You find yourself walking into a very hot and humid rainforest.
events.look_message:
A monkey laughs at you because you are sweating so much.
Looks like you can go any direction except north.
Anything to get out of this heat!

unobtainable_items.message:
Why would you even want a monkey that laughs at you??
He is too high up in the tree anyway.

You don't have anything to collect that with.
Taste salty.

events.name: village1
events.intro_message: As you continue walking forward, you see a tribe of tribal people.
events.death_message: However the indians did not understand your language and decided to sacrifice you to their god.

events.name: forest1
events.intro_message:
As you continue walking through the forest, you find a very dense area.
It becomes harder to walk.
As you look down you realize the bushes have berries on them, but you are unsure of what kind of berries they are.
events.visited_message:
You begin to walk back into a forest.
This place seems fimilar.
It has many bushes and trees.
events.look_message: You realize a path begins to clear in everyway except to the west.

unobtainable_items.message: No you may not have the whole bush!

choices.message: You place said berries in your pocket.
You decide it's probably best not to touch them.

events.name: water1
events.intro_message: After walking through the forest for countless hours, you finally approach a large lake of water.
events.look_message:
You see a clear path in every direction and it looks like you can go swimming if you go south.
A nice, cool, refreshing bath might be nice.

obtainable_items.message: You fill your bottle full of water.

events.name: village2
events.intro_message:
From the distance you see a village!
It finally looks like you could get some help around here.
events.look_message:
It looks like a nice spot for a village but you can't see any people yet.
It looks like the only ways you can continue forward is to the north or the east.
You could also go west and head back to the water.

events.name: village3
events.intro_message: As you get closer to the village, you realize it's not a village at all, just a group of campers
events.victory_message:
You end up staying with them for their camping trip.
You tell them about your incredible journey and they give you plenty if food and water.
After the trip is over they take you back to your home so you can proceed with your normal life.

events.name: wall1
events.intro_message: As you are walking through the forest, you come across an empty bottle.
events.visited_message:
Looks like you've stumbled upon this area of the forest before.
You find an empty bottle.
events.look_message: Looks like the only path is from the way you came, east.

obtainable_items.message: Maybe this will come in handy or just take up pocket space.

events.name: forest2
events.intro_message:
The pig decides to follow you on your journey.
Looks like you made the right choice.
Or maybe not.
events.visited_message:
You continue walking in the forest.
It's seems like this forest is never-ending!
events.look_message:
You see many trees and bushes and some squirrels.
Looks like you can go in any direction but east.

unobtainable_items.message:
You are not strong enough.
But you can hug it you're a tree hugger.

events.name: water2
events.intro_message:
Ahhh, this water feels nice doesn't it.
Wait what is that!!
Is that a shark!!!!
events.death_message:
Maybe going swimming wasn't such a good idea after all...
But the shark enjoyed it.

events.name: lava1
events.intro_message:
What...
What is this.
Why is it so hot in here?
events.death_message:
AHHHHH!
LAVA!!!!
HELP ME!!
AHHHHHH!

events.name: cabin2
events.intro_message:
You begin walking through the woods.
Shortly after, you find a brick cabin.
You go inside the cabin and find,
of all things,
a pig.
events.visited_message:
Looks like you have been here before.
This is the pigs old home!
You stop at the cabin for a quick break and then continue.
Looks like you can head west or south.
events.look_message: You see an obvious exit to the west, or you could head back south.

choices.message:
You decide you and the pig would probably be best friends.
So you decide to bring him with you...

The pig says:
Don't go west! There is a secret path that can take you north.

events.name: jungle1
events.intro_message:
Boy! Is she beautiful!
Everyting about her is perfect!
events.death_message:
Wait
Wh-...
Why does she have a knife?
events.visited_message: Good thing you already dealt with the girl. You may pass without harm.
events.look_message:
Looks like you can go ay direction you want.
You're also a murderer now.

required_to_live.message:
She pulls out a knife,
but,
before she can make a move,
you stab her and she falls to the floor.

events.name: jungle2
events.intro_message:
You are walking through the jungle
You see exits in every direction except north.
Whoa!
Who is she!
You've stumbled upon a beautiful lady, who's all alone in the jungle.
She says if you go west I will follow but south or east I will not.
Her voice is so soothing.
She begins begging you to go west with her.
events.visited_message:
You've been here before!
Look it's the beautiful lady again! You can go anyway except north.
events.look_message:
I already to you which way the paths were.
Just go with the lady.

unobtainable_items.message: She is not up for grabs.

events.name: jungle3
events.intro_message:
Ahhh!
Snakes!
events.visited_message: Good thing you already dealt with these snake. You can pass without harm.
events.death_message:
Ouch!
That one bite me!
Ugghh!
I feel woosey.
events.look_message: You can see a path to the west or go back east where you came.

obtainable_items.message:
You take your knife out of the bloody snakes body.
Eeeewwwww.
That's nasty.

choices.message:
You stare at the snake and it dies of embarassment.
... or maybe it was that knife you threw.

Ye had some food in ye pocket.
Yonder snake fallith asleep.

"Here snakey snakey snakey..."
It clamps down on your ankle.

events.name: start1
events.intro_message:
You awake on the twiggy floor of a forest.

"Where am I?"
On the floor you find:
an apple
a knife
and a grappling hook.
You can only pick one.
events.visited_message:
Hey!
Remember this place?
It's where you started!
events.look_message:
There is a path in every direction.
It's obviously a forest.

choices.message: A shiny apple. It looks good... too good.

events.name: pit1
events.intro_message: You enter a room and immediatly step on a pressure plate that makes the floor drop.
events.death_message:
Ahhh!
There's nothing you can do to stop it now.
You hit the ground.
events.look_message: looks like you can go east or go back west.

required_to_live.message:
Good thing you picked the grappling hook!
You threw it onto the wall and quickly climbed up it!

events.name: cage1
events.intro_message:
You continue walking and realize you walked straight into a cage.
You look up and hear birds.
They're very annoying.
They are hurting your ears.
events.look_message:
You don't know how much more of this you can take.
You see exits everywhere except north.

events.name: cage2
events.intro_message:
God those birds were annoying!
Your ears are bleeding!
events.death_message:
Ugghh your ears hurt so much!
You have lost too much blood.
You fall to the floor.

events.name: savannah1
events.intro_message:
You have been walking for too looong!
And you're sooooo tired!
You need something to drink badly.
Even if you had some stored water, it dried out.
events.death_message:
SOOOOOO.....
THIRSTY......

events.name: savannah2
events.intro_message: Hey, that elephant looks like it wants a hug!
events.visited_message: That elephant still is gone, which is probably good.
events.death_message: *STOMP* *STOMP*
events.look_message:
Grass as far as the eye can see.
A path in every direction

unobtainable_items.message: That guy is long gone, sorry.
Even if she was still here, where would you even keep it?

required_to_live.message: The mouse jumps out of your shirt and scares the elephant away. "Woof!"

events.name: savannah3
events.intro_message: It's a savannah grassland, feels grassy.
events.look_message:
I already told you, it's grassy.
Seems like more savannah to the west, and a meadow to the east.

events.name: meadow2
events.intro_message: You begin waking through a meadow.
events.look_message:
There seems to be a mouse running around your feet.
Looks like you can catch 'em.
You just don't seem to be able to walk south.

obtainable_items.message: He seems happy living in your shirt pocket.

events.name: water3
events.intro_message: You stumble upon an pond.
events.look_message:
You can go east or west,
or if you go south you can take a dip in the pond.

obtainable_items.message: You fill your bottle with water.

events.name: cage3
events.intro_message: You're now in the bottom of a cage-like cave.
events.look_message:
Feathers liter the ground.
There is light to the north, east, and west.
You notice a hidden path to the south.

obtainable_items.message: You take a rather large one, and stick it behind your ear "Macaroni!"

events.name: road1
events.intro_message:
You happen upon a road made of yellow bricks.
Your thoughts flood of lollipops, guilds, kansas, and some cool looking shoes.
events.visited_message: Feels like you've been here before, eh?
events.look_message:
It's a yellow brick road,
does that need to be spelt out to you!
You can follow it east or west.
To the south, there is a forest of fruit!

events.name: city1
events.intro_message: Following the goldish hued pathway there is a city in front of you.
events.look_message:
It's a green, some may say emerald, city.
The city expands east or south.
You could go back west.

events.name: city2
events.intro_message:
A beautiful castle lay before you,
the owner, a women, beckons you upstairs...
events.death_message:
She seems to be not good.
Her green skin says a lot.
She mutters a few words.

events.name: jungle4
events.intro_message:
You find a clearing in the jungle.
Seems like a good place to make a tree house.
events.victory_message:
"Feels like I just won, like, I don't know.... 
life?"

events.name: water4
events.intro_message: you come to what looks like the mouth of a river, and it's moving pretty fast.
events.death_message:
"WAIT!!"

It is quickly pulling you further from the shore.

events.name: water5
events.intro_message: This water is cold, but refreshing.
events.look_message:
You could get out to the north, but you could keep swimming...
The pond continues to the south and west.

unobtainable_items.message: You're swimming, the bottle is safely on shore

events.name: cave1
events.intro_message: It seems to be a dead end.
events.death_message: You're too tired to turn back. Maybe you'll just take a nap.

events.name: forest3
events.intro_message:
What is up with those trees!?
They seem to have a mind of their own.
events.death_message:
"OUCH! Who threw that?"
More apples pelt you.

events.name: city3
events.intro_message:
A man with a large top hat who claims to be "The Wizard" introduces himself.
Claims he can take you home in his hot air balloon.
You take him up on his offer.
.
..
...
....
.....
......
The winds pick up and you get blown off course.

events.name: water6
events.intro_message: An endless pond in all directions. "How long have I been swimming?"
events.victory_message:
You jump awake, "Was it all a dream?"
You pick yourself up out of the bed.

events.name: jungle5
events.intro_message:
You keep walking through what seems like an endless jungle.
Suddenly you see a cat,
a backpack,
and a hang glider,
but you can only carry one.
events.visited_message:
You are walking through the jungle
You realize this is where you saw the cat, backpack, and glider!
events.look_message: Looks like you can head any direction except north.

choices.message:
"Ughh!
This is heavy!
There better be something useful in this."
"Now if only I had something to jump off of!"

events.name: mountains2
events.intro_message:
You begin to come across a large mountain range.
It's very rocky.
events.death_message:
You are curious about what's in your backpack so you open it up.
Inside you find.
a blanket
a full bottle
and a compass.
You realize you are very thirsty
so decide to take a drink from the bottle.
Shortly after drinking it,
you begin to not feel well.
You start coughing and vomitting
and then you fall to the ground
events.look_message: Looks like you can head anywhere.

events.name: cliff1
events.intro_message:
You keep walking along the path when, suddenly, giant spiders start chasing you.
You start sprinting as fast as you can!
Up ahead you realize there is a cliff.
You keep running and reach the edge of the cliff
You have two choices:
events.visited_message:
Hey you've been here before!
This is where the spiders chased you
 but they all feel off the cliff.
You easily hang glide across it.
events.look_message: You can go anywhere except south.

required_to_live.message:
You start sprinting and realize there is a cliff up ahead
so you pull out your hang glider and keep running.
When you reach the cliff,
you jump and easily glide across.
"Wheeee"
You watch the spiders fall off the cliff and laugh at their stupidity!

choices.message:
You jump hoping you can land on a ledge
but you can't.
You hit the ground very hard

events.name: mountains3
events.intro_message: You continue walking through the mountains.
events.look_message:
Looks like mountains
Duh
You can go south or back east.

obtainable_items.message: I'll just keep that in my pocket.

events.name: storm1
events.intro_message:
As you continue walking through the jungle,
it starts getting very cloudy.
Soon the rain starts.
Nearby you see lightning.
So you, stupidly, decide to climb the biggest tree for shelter.
events.death_message:
Not long after that lightning strikes the tree
It breaks in half.
You jump down and have broken many bones.
And to add the cherry on top,
the tree falls on top of you

events.name: water7
events.intro_message: After walking for forever you find some water. You can go north or south.
events.visited_message:
You continue walking and find some water.
Paths lead north and south.
events.look_message: You notice fish in the water but they are moving really fast!

obtainable_items.message:
A fish comes close to you but slips out of your hand.
Then your cat claws it and sets it on the shore.
"Good Kitty!"

events.name: savannah4
events.intro_message: You start walking in a savnnah.
events.look_message: Looks like you can go anyway except west.

events.name: savannah5
events.intro_message: You continue walking through a savannah.
events.death_message:
Suddenly you hear a rumble in the distance.
You begin to see animals running right at you!
"Stampede!!"
Rhinos,
elephants,
giraffes,
lions,
zebras,
and more crush you

events.name: meadow3
events.intro_message:
After walking through that savannah, you come across a meadow.
You begin to feel really hungry.
You seriously need to eat something!
When was the last time you ate?
events.visited_message: You start walking through a meadow.
events.death_message: You starve to death
events.look_message:
Looks like you could head into the unknown to the east
or go west back to that savannah.

required_to_live.message:
You start a fire and cook your fish.
Then you share it with your cat.
"Yum!"

events.name: mountains4
events.intro_message:
You walk up mountain and become tired.
You see a nice cave to take a nap.
You walk inside the cave and find a grizzly bear!
events.death_message:
The bear jumps up and claws you right in the face.
"I get this far and your gonna kill me with a grizzly bear and not even give me a chance to save myself?"
"Yep"
